# Test fbd close command
fbd init --prefix test

# Create issue and capture its hash ID
fbd create 'Issue to close'
cp stdout issue.txt
exec sh -c 'grep -oE "test-[a-z0-9]+" issue.txt > issue_id.txt'

# Close the issue
exec sh -c 'fbd close $(cat issue_id.txt) --reason Fixed'
stdout 'Closed test-'

# Verify it's closed
exec sh -c 'fbd show $(cat issue_id.txt)'
stdout 'closed'
